item.title: ATS Buddy: Privacy-First Resume AI
item.description: ATS Buddy is an AI-powered resume analysis tool built with AWS Bedrock, Textract, and Comprehend for the AWS AI Agent Hackathon. Designed with a privacy-first approach, it automatically redacts sensitive PII before analysis, helping job seekers optimize resumes without exposing personal data. With S3 storage, DynamoDB caching, and serverless workflows via AWS SAM, ATS Buddy provides end-to-end resume analysis that is secure, cost-efficient, and hackathon-ready.
